root.name: Active Cells 3D
root.description: This plug-in implements fast active surfaces for 3D image segmentation. Their representation in terms of spline surfaces allows for a natural and intiutive manipulation of the surface.
root.author: big - Biomedical Imaging Group
root.changelog:
- Version 2.6.0.0 Date 2015-05-24 19:00:15
- Includes subdivision methods
- Version 2.5.0.0 Date 2015-02-11 23:54:35
- Corrected deprecated methods in the Protocols - Fixed some issues in the protocols
- Version 2.4.0.0 Date 2014-11-30 15:56:23
- Added interaction with the control points in the VTK viewer
- Version 2.3.0.1 Date 2014-08-07 20:16:13
- Fixed bug that made it crash with OrthoViewer
- Version 2.2.0.0 Date 2014-05-03 01:31:49
- Adapted to VTK6
- Version 2.1.0.0 Date 2014-04-01 23:27:17
Minor update
- Version 2.0.0.0 Date 2013-12-09 11:20:21
Adjusted to the new ROI mechanisms of Icy.
- Version 1.9.0.0 Date 2013-12-04 13:52:56
Performance improvements
- Version 1.8.0.0 Date 2013-10-30 19:55:57
Modified for icy 1.4
- Version 1.7.0.1 Date 2013-10-24 17:00:41
Rolled back to Java 6
- Version 1.7.0.0 Date 2013-10-24 14:40:30
- Updated to Java 1.6 - Incorporated protocol
- Version 1.6.3.1 Date 2013-10-22 15:27:34
Updated dependencies
- Version 1.6.3.0 Date 2013-05-29 15:48:36
- Modified deprecated methods in Icy 1.3.6 (related to AnchorListeners). - Modified deprecated methods in Icy 1.3.6 (related to painters). - Modified interaction with mouse in the 3D canvas in order to allow the MouseListener methods to be called with null parameter(s). - Implemented getPerimeter method from ROI3D class. - Updated 'online documentation' element from the menu bar. Now it points to the documentation page of Icy. - Updated javadoc.
- Version 1.6.2.0 Date 2013-05-21 10:48:38
Minor improvements
- Version 1.6.1.0 Date 2013-05-08 13:51:14
- Fixed a bug in which the new snake did not comply with the active display settings.
- Version 1.6.0.0 Date 2013-05-06 19:02:14
- Introduced a new panel in the main interface in order to control some display properties in the viewers (mesh resolution, transparency, etc.).
- Added key controls to modify the position of the snake with the arrows.
- Added a method to initialize the snake automatically from a binary mask (experimental).
- Updated javadoc.
- Fixed issues with the "About" logo.
- Version 1.5.1.0 Date 2013-04-26 10:32:13
- Code reorganization. Some classes have been moved to the SDK. - Performance improvements
- Version 1.5.0.0 Date 2013-04-19 17:04:24
- Added the possibility of copying and pasting snakes.
- Version 1.4.0.1 Date 2013-04-17 16:25:06
- Modified the sampling scheme. - Updated javadoc.
- Version 1.4.0.0 Date 2013-04-11 11:36:14
- Rolled back to adjust to release Icy branch
- Version 1.3.0.0 Date 2013-04-11 10:39:23
- Fixed deprecated methods. - Added javadoc 7 style
- Version 1.2.0.0 Date 2013-03-01 10:51:14
Corrected bug that was forcing the initial size
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2013-01-17 11:52:58
Bug fixes
- Version 0.0.3.2 Date 2013-01-06 14:25:29
- Version 0.0.3.1b Date 2012-11-06 09:35:31
Removed the 3D rendering of the control points
- Version 0.0.2.0b Date 2012-11-05 16:25:11
- Version 0.0.1.0b Date 2012-11-02 08:58:35
